flow: # Numeric defaults for Lagos case study (functional unit = 1 L consumed at point of use)
# Notes: sachet assumed 500 mL size (so 2 sachets per FU); PET bottle assumed 500 mL bottle (2 bottles per FU)

comment: Total polymer mass per FU (2 x ~3 g sachets)
Total PET mass per FU (2 x ~12 g bottles)
Volume of water filled per FU
Electricity used per L for filling/processing
Average truck distance from plant to retail (roundtrip equivalent)
Share of sachet packaging collected & recycled
Share of sachet packaging to landfill/dumpsite
Share of sachet packaging openly burned or littered (mismanaged)

flow: # PET-specific end-of-life defaults (override where process-specific modelling used)

comment: Share of PET bottles to landfill/dumpsite
Share of PET bottles openly burned or mismanaged
